S

sell(Company, int, Shareholder) - Method in class objects.Shareholder
This method is executed when a Shareholder decides to sell Shares from a Company.
setCompanyName(String) - Method in class objects.Company
Setter: Assigns a new name for this Company.
setIdnum(int) - Method in class objects.Shareholder
Setter: Assigns a new ID number for this Shareholder.
setOriginCompany(Company) - Method in class objects.Shares
Setter: Changes the Origin Company of which the shares came from.
setShareAmount(int) - Method in class objects.Shares
Setter: Sets the shareAmount of the Share to a new Amount
setShareOwner(Shareholder) - Method in class objects.Shares
Setter: Changes the Shareholder for this Share.
setSharePrice(double) - Method in class objects.Company
Setter: Assigns a new Share price for this Company.
setSharePrice(double) - Method in class objects.Shares
Assigns a new price for the Shares.
setShares(int) - Method in class objects.Company
Setter: Assigns a new amount of Shares to the Company.
setShName(String) - Method in class objects.Shareholder
Setter: Sets a new name for the Shareholder.
setStockSymbol(String) - Method in class objects.Company
Setter: Assigns a new Stock Symbol for this Company.
Shareholder - Class in objects
This class describes the Shareholder object.

Constructor for Shareholder object.
Shares - Class in objects
This class Describes the Shares object which is subsequently a property of Company and Shareholder objects

Share object Constructor.
ShowCompanyPortfolioAction - Class in menuClases
This Class describes the Show Company Portfolio option of the Company Administration Menu.

showPortfolio() - Method in class objects.Shareholder
This method is a to String of sorts for the Shareholder object.
ShowReportAction - Class in menuClases
This class describes the action of the Show Report option in the Administration of Company's Menu.

ShowShareholderPortfolioAction - Class in menuClases
This Class describes the Show Shareholder Portfolio option in the Administration of Shareholder's Menu
ShowShareholderPortfolioAction() - Constructor for class menuClases.ShowShareholderPortfolioAction
 
splitStock() - Method in class objects.Company
This method will split the stock for this Company, which means cut the Shares price in half and double the amount of hares for this Company and every other Shareholder of this Company.
SplitStockAction - Class in menuClases
This class describes the action of the Split Stock option in the Administration of Stocks Menu.
SplitStockAction() - Constructor for class menuClases.SplitStockAction
 
summary(Shareholder, Company) - Method in class objects.Shareholder
This method will make a summary of all of the Shares purchased by this Shareholder for a Company and return the max amount of available Shares in the Shareholder's portfolio.
